lender.name: Paul

lender.occupational_info: I am currently unemployed and my future is uncertain, but as soon as I am repaid, I am re-loaning funds and will do so as long as I can! I certainly can appreciate the struggles involved in triumphing over adversity!

lender.name: CLF Foundations Class
lender.loan_because: I am in charge of money raised by the people pictured. We came together in a class at Creative Living Fellowship in Phoenix, Arizona, in the fall and winter of 2008, and decided to loan some of the funds we raised to KIVA. These loans are made in the name of the Foundations Class of CLF, Phoenix, AZ, fall and winter of 2008.
lender.occupational_info: We come from all walks of life. The one thing that we definitely have in common is our belief that all people are equal, and that we all can, and should, support one another on this journey we call "life".

lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be among the lucky and helping to better the lives of others betters my life.

I open this company already 4 months, but now i have no money to orperate it, to buy pc components. The pc, laptop market in Viet Nam at the moment has very bright prospect. It is also a hight profitable market. In 2009, My targeted client is Hight school, student and small education project. For this reason i want to loan money to activate this plan.
